Python:
# でつoO(YOU PLAY WITH THE CARDS YOU'RE DEALT..)
import sys
def main():
    input = sys.stdin.readline
    H, W = map(int, input().split())
    A = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(H)]
    R = [sum(A[i]) for i in range(H)]
    C = [sum(A[i][j] for i in range(H)) for j in range(W)]
    ans = [[R[i] + C[j] - A[i][j] for j in range(W)] for i in range(H)]
    for a in ans:
        print(*a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

Crystal:
h, w = read_line.split.map(&.to_i)
a = (1..h).map { read_line.split.map(&.to_i) }
row_sum = a.map(&.sum)
column_sum = a.transpose.map(&.sum)
(0...h).each do |i|
  puts (0...w).join(' ') { |j|
    row_sum[i] + column_sum[j] - a[i][j]
  }
end

Ruby:
lines = readlines

h, w = lines.shift.split.map(&:to_i)

a = Array.new(h) do |i|
    lines[i].split.map(&:to_i)
end

cols = a.transpose.map(&:sum)

for i in 0...h
    a_i = a[i]
    row = a_i.sum
    for j in 0...w
        a_i[j] = (row + cols[j] - a_i[j]).to_s
    end
    puts a_i.join(' ')
end

# でつoO(YOU PLAY WITH THE CARDS YOU'RE DEALT..)
import sys
def main():
    input = sys.stdin.readline
    H, W = map(int, input().split())
    A = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(H)]
    R = [sum(A[i]) for i in range(H)]
    C = [sum(A[i][j] for i in range(H)) for j in range(W)]
    ans = [[R[i] + C[j] - A[i][j] for j in range(W)] for i in range(H)]
    for a in ans:
        print(*a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
